infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Crossed needs access to your camera to let you take profile pictures and send photos in chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Crossed needs access to your photo library to let you upload profile pictures and share photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Crossed uses your location to help you find people who share the same places you do.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Crossed uses background location to notify you when you enter places worth saving, like cafes or gyms.

plugins.locationInUsePermission: Crossed uses your location to help you find people who share the same places you do. Your location is only saved when you choose to.
plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Crossed uses background location to notify you when you enter places worth saving, like cafes or gyms. This is strictly opt-in and does not track your history.
